段: 十三十四電頭鬃呀，喔貢貢，十五十六轉大人呀，喔貢貢，做人爸母若知子輕重貢，應該給伊趕緊去嫁夫呀，喔貢貢呀喔貢貢。多謝你的雞婆，害你念到一大套，毋免你煩惱，媒人阮會自己做。

lu2-seng3 sit-loan5 mui2-jit8 lau5 bak8-sai2, ah! sun5-cheng5 e5 lu2-seng3. sou2 liu5 e5 bak8-sai2 u7 siann2-lang5 e7 liau2-kai2, lam5-seng3 sit-loan5 chainn2-iunn7 li2 kam2 chai. na7 si7 lam5-seng3 lai5 sit-loan5, che si7 kan2-tan e5 tai7-chi3, siann2-lang5 m7 chai, chi2-u7 eng7 chiu2 kai2-siau tioh8 sim-lai7. chi2-u7 nng7 kan-a2 sio-chiu2, i chiu7 u7 hoat-tou7 thang kai2 iu-chhiu5, chi2-u7 eng7 hun toa7 khui3 buh--chhut-lai5.
啊！無就買兩包仔，長壽薰大大氣霧出來哩，滿腹恨火用薰用酒解。咱心裡的恨火，毋是燒酒那有法通來解的，自暴自棄暗悲毋敢愛。親像我滿腹的痛苦，欲對啥人來表示咧，愈想愈恨啥麼叫做愛。若講起伊對待我這款，敢是叫做愛咧，愈想愈惱當初太癡心。當初是我無目睭，才會去愛著你。

段: 九九講是天公牌，00講是地王牌，那著四四講會壞，啊！現代人是真趣味，出門行路是頭攲攲，正途的生理是放一邊。啊！講啥麼赴市，規粒頭殼是全牌支。

啊！透早起床來迫籤詩，中晝是電子計算機，半晡包壇來問童乩。啊！暗時[毛^火]來去看浮字，半暝夢啊！夢牌支，夢啥麼我夢著一隻豬，啊！夢豬講十二，閣夢啥麼，我夢著西湖靈隱寺，濟公活佛欲破天機，拄好欲破彼當時，啊！雄雄煞精神，雄雄煞精神。

ah! thau3-cha2 khi2-chhng5 lai5 pek chhiam-si, tiong-tau3 si7 tian7-chu2 ke3-sng3-ki, poann3-pou pau toann5 lai5 mng7 tang5-ki. ah! am3-si5 chhoa7 lai5-khi3 khoann3 phu5 ji7, poann3-mi5 bang7 ah! bang7 pai5-ki, bang7 siann2-mih8 goa2 bang7 tioh8 chit8 chiah ti, ah! bang7 ti kong2 chap8-ji7, koh bang7 siann2-mih8, goa2 bang7 tioh8 Se-ou5 Leng5-un2-si7, che3-kong oah8-put8 beh phoa3 thian-ki, tu2-ho2 beh phoa3 hit-tong-si5, ah! hiong5-hiong5 soah cheng-sin5, hiong5-hiong5 soah cheng-sin5.
阮一个老厝邊，去年簽到這當時，毋捌著半支，想著是真懨氣，衰衰樂講無歹意，省本又多利。毋出牌算算三十隻，這每是百面等領錢，一下開講對對著七支，啊！七蕊花講較有錢，好歹嘛著試，會仔錢先共拿來與。

goan2 it e5 lau7-chhu3-pinn, ku7-ni5 chhiam kau3 chit-tong-si5, m7 pat tioh8 poann3 ki, siunn7 tioh8 si7 chin ian3-khi3, soe-soe-lok8 kong2 bo5 phainn2-i3, seng2-pun2 iu7 tou-lai7. m7 chhut pai5 sng3-sng3 sann-chap8 chiah, chit mui2 si7 pah bin7 tan2 nia2-chinn5, chit8 e7 khai-kang2 tui3-tui3 tioh8 chhit ki, ah! chhit lui2 hoe kong2 khah u7 chinn5, ho2-phainn2 ma7 tioh8 chhi3, hoe7-a2-chinn5 seng ka7 na2 lai5 i7.
啊！欲好額麼著看這期，一下開講著三蕊，去予四蕊捧捧去捧捧去，話若欲講透機，我目屎會拭袂離。啊！會仔錢是逐陣死，貨款是全票期，親情朋友是走去覕，厝邊頭尾是借無錢，勸恁朋友著覺醒，啥麼樂扯予離，正當生理較濟錢。

ah! beh ho2-giah8 mah tioh8 khoann3 chit ki5, chit8 e7 khui kong2 tioh8 sann lui2, khi3 hou7 si3 lui2 phong2-phong2--khi3 phong2-phong2--khi3, oe7 na7 beh kong2 thau3-ki, goa2 bak8-sai2 e7 chhit boe7 li7. ah! hoe7-a2-chinn5 si7 tak8 tin7 si2, hoe3-khoan2 si7 choan5 phio3-ki5, chhin-chiann5 peng5-iu2 si7 chau2 khi3 bih, chhu3-pinn thau5-boe2 si7 chioh bo5 chinn5, khng3 lin2 peng5-iu2 tioh8 kak-chhenn2, siann2-mih8 lok8 thiah hou7 li7, cheng3-tong seng-li2 khah che7 chinn5.
樂啊！樂啊！你毋通迷，樂啊！樂啊！你毋通與，閣再與會無彩錢。
lok8-ah! lok8-ah! li2 m7 thang bi5, lok8-ah! lok8-ah! li2 m7 thang i7, koh chai3 i7-hoe7 bo5 chhai2-chinn5.
這毋是你的錯誤，也毋是我的過錯，如今變成這款的結果，真是予人想攏無。我相信我相信無人比我對你閣較好，為啥麼為啥麼咱的緣份那會即爾薄。啊！今夜又閣底落雨又閣底落雨，聽著雨聲我的心肝會艱苦。

Chit m7 si7 li2 e5 chho3-gou7, ia7 m7 si7 goa2 e5 koe3-chho3, ju5-kim pinn3-chiann5 chit khoan2 e5 kiat-ko2, chin si7 hou7 lang5 siunn7 long2 bo5. goa2 siong-sin3 goa2 siong-sin3 bo5 lang5 pi2 goa2 tui3 li2 koh khah ho2, ui7-siann2-mih8 ui7-siann2-mih8 lan2 e5 ian5-hun7 na2 e7 chiah-nih poh8. a2! kim-ia7 iu7 koh teh loh8-hou7 iu7 koh teh loh8-hou7, thiann tioh8 hou7-siann goa2 e5 sim-koann e7 kan-khou2.
